Amsterdam special #5 : Bitterballen (Dutch meatballs). What can I say about these heavenly delicious meatballs apart from that they will make you go YUM! The perfect accompaniment to a tall glass of chilled beer (or even just alone), these little balls of flavor are filled with beef, broth, flour, and herbs for flavor before they are deep-fried. Be careful when you bite into them; the liquid filling can be super hot. Definitely recommended!  Follow for more delicious food pics.  Check out more stuff food stuff here: http://thefoodasaurus.com  #amsterdam #amsterdamfood #meatballs #bitterballen #Foodblogger #foodpics #foodporn #foodgasm #thefoodpunch #buzzfeast #foodblog #foodie #instafood #FoodPhotography #mumbaicuisine #mumbaifoodie #munchymumbai #carnivore #food #foodofmumbai #foodpornshare #LoveToEat #LiveToEat #foodstagram #foodshare #goodeats #mumbaifoodicious #zomato

Nieuwe biertjes proeven is altijd leuk. La Chouffe, Mongozo; een heel grappig biertje wat meer smaakte naar bananensnoepjes dan naar bier en een superlekker IPAtje van @brewdogofficial Gedronken in een heel relaxed en leuk biercafeetje op Amsterdam CS (zie locatie) met een grote speciaalbiertjeskaart. * Tasting new beer is always fun. La Chouffe + Mongozo; a very funny banana beer which tasted more like banana candy than like beer and a really nice IPA from @brewdogofficial @ a very relaxed and fun beer pub  with a large craftbeer menu at Amsterdam Central Station (see location). #amsterdamfood #amsterdamdrinks #beer #craftbeer #bananabeer #lachouffe #brewdog #bier

The Dutch have handed down the chairmanship of the EU to the Slovakians, which means that the former Marine Land of the Dutch Navy is ours again! Reason for us to explore this extraordinary piece of land adjacent to the Scheepvaartmuseum with its replica of the VOC tall ship 'Amsterdam' at which a beautiful view is granted. The terrace is one of its most pleasant surprises. As is the beer menu. From fresh to the more dark beers, all with a special twist. The combination makes for a great evening on the waterside. That was our first evening. We went back for lunch in the bar. And that was good too. Service was friendly though sometimes a little slow. The sandwiches are tasty and the juices refreshing. And they know how to make a good espresso. Drop by when you are in the hood! We continued to the Scheepskameel. Stay tuned for our review! ——————————————————————— Food ⭐️⭐️️⭐️ Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️ Ambiance ⭐️⭐️⭐️ ——————————————————————— Brewery Homeland Kattenburgerstraat 5 020-7232550 www.pensionhomeland.com  Open: Mon-Sun 7.00-0.00 ——————————————————————— #breakfast #lunch #dinner #juices #coffee #sandwiches #marineterrein #marine #amsterdam #amsterdamrestaurants #amsterdamfood #food #proefwerk #instafood #foodstagram #restaurantreview #hamoflamb #tomatochutney ——————————————————————— Follow AMSTERDAM RESTAURANTS for more reviews of your next to know favorites. Throwback to the almighty chaos dish that is Nasi Rames at Kartika, Amsterdam.  You have your nasi goreng, telor pedis, sate kambing, sayur lodeh and your daging rendang! Easy translation to heavenly goodness!! Taste Amsterdam - Amstelpark, 2nd - 5th June.  Last year we spent a sun-soaked day here, eating & drinking until we ran out of the taste currency 'florijnen'. It was great & I've been looking forward to this years ever since.  This is a gathering of Amsterdam's top restaurants offering a number of dishes each. Also, there are bars of every description; cocktail, G&T, beer, champagne, the lot!  Also cooking demonstrations, workshops & plenty to occupy the kids. The highlight for them last year was a huge ferris wheel ride... for me it was the glass of champagne you got with each ride! 👍🏻 There is also a 'Taste of Kids' area, great for pre-schoolers & older.  My tip would be to get there early to grab somewhere nice to lounge & set up camp. Also take lots of money as the florijnen tend to go pretty quickly!  Cannot wait!  #tasteofamsterdam2016 #tasteofamsterdam #tastefestival #amsterdamfood #amsterdamfoodfestival #amsterdamforkids #kidsinamsterdam #kindvriendelijk #amsterdamrestaurants #iamsterdam #gramthedam #iloveamsterdam #igamsterdam #igersamsterdam #thingstodoinamsterdam #exploreamsterdam #instaamsterdam #imamsterdam #exploreamsterdam #mamasinamsterdam #amstergram #wonderlustamsterdam

Apparently everyone comes here either for beer or their signature apple pie. I see the waitress slicing pies after pies to endless customers. Chunky apples and a nice tender crust with a hint of cinnamon. So good!

Been missing this since came back from #amsterdam  #ossenworst from #brouwerjtIJ -- the last remaining windmill in Amsterdam city, now, it's a restaurant/ beer garden. This is smoked raw beef #sausage, originally made from ox meat, it's a specialty in Amsterdam since 17th century. It taste like a very good smoked beef tartare, but slightly more firm, a sausage-like texture and smoky flavor. 😋I'm loving it #foodstagram #instafood #foodphotography #travel #eatingAmsterdam #amsterdameats #amsterdamfood

PARADISE FOR MEAT LOVERS - @cannibaleroyale  Visit for heavenly streaks, ribs and burgers, as well delicious wine and really good beer! And don't forget to book a table. What was meant to be a simple dinner in the hood, ended up being a Greek feast with plenty of raki, beer, great food and shamefully bad discussions. To Ouzeri served us well. When you go, try the Spanakopites (pastries w/ spinach and feta), Chaloumi (fried cheese), Tiri Saganaki (melted cheese in brandy), Moschari Souvlaki (kebab of grilled tenderloin), Loukaniko Scharas (grilled sausages) and order a side of the delicious pita bread. You won't be disappointed. #oldwestrules #cheeseforpresident #greekfood #tirisaganaki #cheese #dinner #amsterdam #amsterdamoudwest #amsterdamdinner #amsterdamfood #amsterdameats #mirhaxAmsterdam

Fantastic fish. & chips from @fishbarsaltzer in Amsterdam Centraal station. Fresh cod, cooked perfectly in a beer batter along with fries, mayo, coleslaw and remoulade sauce. All served with a wonderful river view
